modName: Loading Screens and Main Menu Replacer
summary:
[Pictures contain full nudity]
53 pictures who can be used as a replacement for the loading screens and/or the main menu.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=4][Contains full nudity][/size][/color]
Pictures who can be used as a replacement for the loading screens in Skyrim and/or the main menu background.
You however have to do some work on your own. You can choose which pictures you want and which you don't want.
Every picture has 2 dds files, 1 that can be use as a loading screen, and 1 that can be used as a main menu background. (Numbers match)

For the loading screens to work you need the mod:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36166/? (I believe it should also work with the other mods uploaded by the same author.)
Choose the pictuers you want, rename the dds files who end with a L to the same name structure used by the mod above (for example: from 21 L.dss to load_31.dss) and replace them.

For the main menu backgrounds to work you need the mod:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3708/?
Choose the pictures you want, rename the dds files who don't have an L and rename them to MAINMENUWALLPAPER.dds (for example: from 21.dds to MAINMENUWALLPAPER.dds) and replace them.

There are now also 2 versions available who are compatible with NMM or MO. One with loading screens and with main menu backgrounds. They don't contain all of the 53 original pictures though. They only contain 25 loading screens and 20 main menu backgrounds and they both use different pictures. So if you use them both, you still got 45 pictures.

For the preset you need the following mods:
(Race is Nord)
Body type is UNPRT (search on google)
Skin is [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73512/?]Leyenda Skin[/url]
Eyes are from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75674/?]Lind's Human Eyes[/url]
Eyesbrows are from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url]
Hair comes from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47000/?]Skyrim Hair Physics Project[/url]
author: kempo95
